entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to snow mixed with rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
